comments.body: Hello, This feature is not available in our platform. That is because this is natively supported. If the native platfrom provide a way to disable this horizontal bounce please share with us the guide link on how that is  done in native platform. We will consider this ticket as a new feature request. Thanks.

Hi,

Please check the below link:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9459751/disable-the-vertical-scroll-behavior-of-the-scrollviewer-in-windows-phone

Thanks.
Hello, We need a reference to official windows docs links to the feature. We need to know how this is done in Windows platform. Thanks.
